name: Storm Out
description:
Project developed during Pixel Challenge 2018 in Quebec City (April 5th to April 7th). The theme was "The Perfect Storm".

The team decided to step away from typical definitions of the word "storm" to end up using the expression "storming out of some place".

The team represented Cégep Limoilou's game design program.

Team Limoilou:
- David Larouche
- Jérémy Blackburn
- Mariane Vincent
- Christian Auger-Morin
- Mathieu Hunter
- Gabriel Tousignant (music/sound composer that was matched to our team)

We hope you enjoy the game! :)
